casebody.data:
Thursday, December 23, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

99-2158. In re Adoption of Asente.

Trumbull App. Nos. 99-T-0055, 99-T-0056, 99-T-0057 and 99-T-0058. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment be, and hereby is, denied.

Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
